page.title: 08Amenities
page.content: There is a telephone box in Ecton village and two post boxes. There are two pubs in Ecton. The Three Horse Shoes is built of bricks. The Worlds End is built of stone. It was a coaching inn and used to be called The Globe. It has been there since 1765. There is one pub in Bellinge. It is called The Deers Leap and it is modern. In Ecton Brook there is a Health Centre which includes a doctors surgery and a chemist. There is a Post Office at Great Billing. For a dentist or a library you need to visit the Weston Favell Centre. The Elwes Arms is the pub at Great Billing. The Ecton Brook is a newly built pub in Ecton Brook.
